amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title II (Regulatory Accountability Act of 2014) and title IV (Sunshine for Regulatory Decrees and Settlements Act) from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-361 to cut titles II and IV from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
